Description.Name: Welcome to the Rimward Periphery.
Description.Details:
The Rimward Periphery is a region of space adjacent to the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreInnerSphere],Inner Sphere]] states of the [[DM.Factions[faction_Liao],Capellan Confederation]], [[DM.Factions[faction_Davion],Federated Suns]] and the [[DM.Factions[faction_Marik],Free Worlds League]].

Colonized early during humankind's expansion to the stars, it contains several minor [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LorePeriphery],Periphery]] states such as the [[DM.Factions[faction_MagistracyOfCanopus],Magistracy Of Canopus]], [[DM.Factions[faction_TaurianConcordat],Taurian Concordat]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAuriganCoalition],Aurigan Coalition]], and the [[DM.Factions[faction_MarianHegemony],Marian Hegemony]], as well as a myriad of independent worlds and pirate kingdoms, including the notorious [[DM.Factions[faction_TortugaDominion],Tortuga Dominion]].

Forcefully annexed by the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSLDF],SLDF]] during the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreReunificationWar],Reunification War]], the occupation lasted until the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreNewVandenburgUprising],New Vandenburg Uprising]] which eventually led to the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAmarisCivilWar],fall]] of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreStarLeague],Star League]] and the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSuccessionWars],Succession Wars]].

It is here that your story begins...
